name: istpsi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpbir2an(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c2, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c2)))
stmt.pretty: mpbir2an(c0 ∈ TopSp, c2 ∈ Top, c1 = ⋃ c2)

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c2, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c2))))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c2 ∈ Top
⊣ c1 = ⋃ c2
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c2 ∈ Top ∧ c1 = ⋃ c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c2, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c2 ∈ Top
⊣ c1 = ⋃ c2
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c2 ∈ Top ∧ c1 = ⋃ c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c2, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c2 ∈ Top ∧ c1 = ⋃ c2))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c2 ∈ Top
⊣ c1 = ⋃ c2
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c2 ∈ Top
⊣ c1 = ⋃ c2
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ (Base ` c0)= c1

body.origin:
|- wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
-| wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), c2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c2 ∈ Top
⊣ c1 = ⋃ c2
⊣ (Base ` c0)= c1
⊣ (TopOpen ` c0)= c2

comment: Properties that determine a topological space. (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2012.)
